text: I'm so not stylish by nature, but I've learned to work with what I have.
author: Julie Bowen

text: Cruelty is the law pervading all nature and society and we can't get out of it if we would.
author: Thomas Hardy

text: We don't do things we aren't good at by nature. I wouldn't play basketball because I'm only 5' 1". Find what you enjoy - whether it's racing, flying a helicopter, being a doctor, or stitching clothes together. Once you've done that, you have the passion you need.
author: Danica Patrick

text: I think that the best way to explain that is that my mother gave me all the color and character and flare and liveliness, and my father gave me all the sanity and nature and all the things that helped me be a more rounded human being.
author: Julie Andrews

text: A desire to resist oppression is implanted in the nature of man.
author: Tacitus
